content:
I'm glad to hear that you had a positive experience with the fitness center at the Hilton Tokyo Shinjuku!

Regarding loyalty program benefits and upgrades, the Hilton Tokyo Shinjuku is part of the Hilton Honors loyalty program. As a Hilton Honors member, you can earn points and rewards, including room upgrades, at participating Hilton properties worldwide.

Here are some benefits you might be eligible for at the Hilton Tokyo Shinjuku:

* **Room Upgrades:** Depending on your Hilton Honors tier status, you might be eligible for a room upgrade, which could include a higher floor, a room with a better view, or even a suite.
* **Executive Lounge Access:** If you're a Hilton Honors Gold or Diamond member, you'll have access to the hotel's Executive Lounge, which offers complimentary breakfast, afternoon tea, and evening cocktails.
* **Late Check-out:** Hilton Honors members may be eligible for a late check-out, subject to availability.
* **Points Earning:** You'll earn Hilton Honors points for every eligible stay at the Hilton Tokyo Shinjuku, which can be redeemed for free nights, room upgrades, and other rewards.

To take advantage of these benefits, make sure to join the Hilton Honors program and log in to your account when booking your stay. If you're already a member, be sure to provide your Hilton Honors number when checking in to ensure you receive your benefits.

It's great to hear that you were able to use your loyalty points to book a room at the Grand Hyatt DFW and received a suite upgrade! Loyalty programs can definitely provide some wonderful perks and upgrades, and it's always exciting to experience them firsthand.
